PathUID.description: The UID of the path used by this object.

AutoRunSpeed.description: The speed Sonic and the custom hero will boost at while in auto-run mode.

Type.description: What this trigger does. Start means this trigger starts a double boost section. End means this trigger will stop a double boost section. End Auto-Run means this trigger will take the player out of auto-run mode(?).
